***Workload dictates amount of manpower.***

Varying manpower resources across hospitals.
<br> Varying workload across hospitals.
<br>
<br> Because the number of admissions varies across hospitals, the workload is standardised to per 1000 admissions.
<br>
<br> **Provision of manpower resource per unit of workload = Number of specialists per 1000 admissions.**
<br>
<br> *e.g. HKL has 74 specialists handling General Medicine workload, for the given number of admissions in HKL (37067), it has 2.0 specialists handling every 1000 admissions.*
